page.title: 08HOMELIFE,HEALTH,RELIGION
page.content: {Pets}Small family units.Most people have at least one pet eg dog,cat etc. {Safety}Anti-theft devices. Cut-out facilities on electrical appliances. {Food }Most people grow vegetables or soft fruit.Farmers and manual workers eat big breakfasts including cereal and egg etc. and tea or coffee.The elderly are not so energetic and eat less.Main meals consist of meat,vegetables or salad,puddings or fruit.Traditional Cornish fare include pasties,saffron cake, heavy cake etc. Brown bread is more popular,less fats are eaten. {Health and Disabilities}Health centre at St.Keverne with two doctors.Various aids available eg walking frames. { {Religion} Methodists and Anglicans worship locally.Roman Catholic Church is at Helston. {
